item.name: >Number of disk block requests (cache) for table or index
item.description: Number of disk block requests found in cache for table or index

item.name: Database size
Number of active connections
Number of active server procesess
Number of active server processes
item.description: Number of active server processes for database

item.name: Number of background writer's timed checkpoints
item.description: Number of times the background writer has started timed checkpoints (because the checkpoint_timeout time has expired)

item.name: Number of background writer interrupted cleanings
item.description: Number of times the background writer has stopped its cleaning scan because it has written more buffers than specified in the bgwriter_lru_maxpages parameter

item.name: Number of background writer requested checkpoints
item.description: Number of times the background writer has started checkpoints based on requests from backends because the checkpoint_segments has been exceeded or because the CHECKPOINT command has been issued

item.name: Number of buffers written by backends
item.description: Number of buffers written by backends because they needed to allocate a new buffer

item.name: Number of buffers written by the background writer during checkpoints
item.description: Number of buffers written by the background writer during checkpoints

item.name: Number of buffers written by the background writer for routine cleaning of dirty pages
item.description: Number of buffers written by the background writer for routine cleaning of dirty pages

item.name: Number of commited transactions
Number of dead rows
item.description: Number of dead rows in table

item.name: Number of disk block fetch requests (cache) for database
item.description: Number of disk block fetch requests found in cache for database

item.name: Number of disk block fetch requests (in current transaction)
item.description: Number of disk block fetch requests for table or index, in the current transaction

item.name: Number of disk block fetch requests for database
item.description: Number of disk block fetch requests for database

item.name: Number of disk block fetch requests to table/index
item.description: Number of disk block fetch requests for table or index

item.name: Number of disk block requests (cache, in current transaction)
item.description: Number of disk block requests found in cache for table or index, in the current transaction

item.name: Number of live rowsNumber of live rows
item.description: Number of live rows in table

item.name: Number of queries canceled (deadlocks)
item.description: Number of queries canceled because of recovery conflict with deadlocks in database

item.name: Number of queries canceled (dropped tablespaces)
item.description: Number of queries canceled because of recovery conflict with dropped tablespaces in database

item.name: Number of queries canceled (locks)
item.description: Number of queries canceled because of recovery conflict with locks in database

item.name: Number of queries canceled (old snapshots)
item.description: Number of queries canceled because of recovery conflict with old snapshots in database

item.name: Number of queries canceled (pinned buffers)
item.description: Number of queries canceled because of recovery conflict with pinned buffers in database

item.name: Number of rolled back transactions
Number of rows deleted
item.description: Number of rows deleted from table

item.name: Number of rows deleted (in current transaction)
item.description: Number of rows deleted from table, in the current transaction

item.name: Number of rows HOT-updated
item.description: Number of rows HOT-updated in table

item.name: Number of rows HOT-updated (in current transaction)
item.description: Number of rows HOT-updated in table, in the current transaction

item.name: Number of rows inserted
item.description: Number of rows inserted into table

item.name: Number of rows inserted (in current transaction)
item.description: Number of rows inserted into table, in the current transaction

item.name: Number of rows read by sequential scans/index entries returned
item.description: Number of rows read by sequential scans when argument is a table, or number of index entries returned when argument is an index

item.name: Number of rows read by sequential scans/index entries returned (in current transaction)
item.description: Number of rows read by sequential scans when argument is a table, or number of index entries returned when argument is an index, in the current transaction

item.name: Number of rows updated (includes HOT updates)
item.description: Number of rows updated in table (includes HOT updates)

item.name: Number of rows updated (includes HOT updates, in current transaction)
item.description: Number of rows updated in table (includes HOT updates), in the current transaction

item.name: Number of running postgres processes
Number of sequential/index scans
item.description: Number of sequential scans done when argument is a table, or number of index scans done when argument is an index

item.name: Number of sequential/index scans (in current transaction)
item.description: Number of sequential scans done when argument is a table, or number of index scans done when argument is an index, in the current transaction

item.name: Number of table rows fetched by bitmap/index scans
item.description: Number of table rows fetched by bitmap scans when argument is a table, or table rows fetched by simple index scans using the index when argument is an index

item.name: Number of table rows fetched by bitmap/index scans (in current transaction)
item.description: Number of table rows fetched by bitmap scans when argument is a table, or table rows fetched by simple index scans using the index when argument is an index, in the current transaction

item.name: Number of times table has been non-FULL vacuumed manually
item.description: The number of times this table has been non-FULL vacuumed manually

item.name: Number of times this table has been analyzed by the autovacuum daemon
item.description: The number of times this table has been analyzed by the autovacuum daemon

item.name: Number of times this table has been analyzed manually
item.description: The number of times this table has been analyzed manually

item.name: Number of times this table has been vacuumed by the autovacuum daemon
item.description: The number of times this table has been vacuumed by the autovacuum daemon

item.name: Number of transactions committed
item.description: Number of transactions committed in database

item.name: Number of transactions rolled back
item.description: Number of transactions rolled back in databasec
